column1: Most of our bones that articulate at freely movable joints can be described as third class levers. What does this mean?
column3: the “effort arm” is longer than the “load arm”
column4: the muscle’s tendon is inserted between the load and the joint
column5: the muscle’s tendon is inserted close to the joint
